The pure class interface. 
public class PremonPanel
  extends Panel
A panel containing the source code editor.

Author:
Alan Jeffrey
Version: v1.0 1998/06/03

PremonPanel(PremonEnvironment)
Create a new editor without a parent frame.
PremonPanel(PremonEnvironment, PremonFrame)
Create a new editor.

PremonPanel
public PremonPanel(PremonEnvironment env,
                   PremonFrame parent);
Create a new editor.

Parameters:
env - the applet environment.
parent - the parent frame (if there is one).

PremonPanel
